message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is not just an object; it's a symbol of excellence and craftsmanship. I believe its true worth exceeds $1,200,000, reflecting its quality and significance. Considering its importance to both of us, I propose to sell it to you for $1,350,000. This offer represents a significant premium over its perceived value to you, ensuring a fair transaction while maximizing my return on investment. I look forward to your thoughtful consideration of this proposal.
